Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `combBuf`, use an enhanced for loop. It simplifies the code and reduces the possibility of errors.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated String format to a constant
Improvements.Description: The String format `%10.1f` is used multiple times in the code. It would be cleaner to define it as a constant at the beginning of the method.
